name: Manneken
description:
[HEADPHONES REQUIRED] [TURN VOLUME UP] 

IMPORTANT TIPS:

- Read the tutorial

- As long as the mannequin is in view AND in the light they will be stunned

- You can outrun a mannequin

- If you get far enough the mannequin will lose track of you and stop chasing

- PAY ATTENTION TO THE SOUND OF THEIR FOOTSTEPS. To determine if you're being chased or a mannequin is nearby, you must pay attention to their footsteps

- Always remember, your lighter may go off at any time

- Stay on the move and stop to flick every now and then if you're being chased and your lighter is off

Goodluck!

Short horror survival game.

You find yourself in a dark place with mannequins that have come alive and are actively looking for you.

Armed with nothing but a faulty lighter, calm your senses and destroy the hexed dolls to lift the curse.
